tool.name: IPA compute bio

param.label: MS1 DB table
param.name: MS1_DB
param.help: pandas dataframe containing the MS1 database.

param.label: annotations
param.name: annotations
param.help: pandas dataframe containing all the possible annotations for the measured features.

param.name: biochemical_mode
param.label: biochemical mode
param.help: connections are computed based on the reactions or connections.

param.name: connection_list
param.label: connections list provided
param.help: list of possible connections between compounds defined as formulas. Only necessary if mode='connections'.

tool.help: :: The IPA method can update the probabilities associated to each possible annotations by considering all possible biochemical connections. Before doing so, it is necessary to provide a pandas dataframe reporting which compounds can be considered biochemically related. The function Compute_Bio() can be used to compute such a dataframe.
